summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the City of Dallas will convene on January 9, 2025, at 9:00 AM. This meeting will be conducted via video conference and in-person at the Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers, allowing public attendance both virtually and physically. The session will be broadcast live on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and online.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The committee will review and approve minutes from previous meetings and discuss the performance review process for key city positions, including the City Manager, City Secretary, City Attorney, and Inspector General. Presentations from recruiting firms regarding the search for a new Inspector General will also be featured.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the performance review process outlined by Baker Tilly and the selection of a recruiting firm for the Inspector General position. The committee will also discuss the goals, performance review metrics, and timelines for annual evaluations of the appointed city officials.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is expected to recommend a recruiting firm for the Inspector General search to the city council and finalize the performance review metrics and schedule for the appointed positions. Additionally, there may be discussions in executive session regarding legal matters, property negotiations, and personnel evaluations.
